Sorry to disappoint

There are currently no downloads for Enjade available at the moment. Alternatively, you can check the GitHub repositories for progress.

Go to GitHub ›

Ready to download?

If you're ready to download the Enjade desktop, you can take a look here to get your hands on this beautiful, modern desktop.

Enjade Core

Enjade Core is the traditional Plasma-based desktop that continues Unity 7 through means of Plasmoids. Core provides support for Wayland and often get new features before Enjade Pure.

The Ubuntu distro with Enjade Core uses the long-term support releases (LTS). Learn more ›

Desktop Environment

Ubuntu with Enjade Core

Enjade Pure

If you're ready to download the Enjade desktop, you can take a look here to get your hands on this beautiful, modern desktop.

The Ubuntu distro with Enjade Pure uses the regular, time-based releases. Learn more ›

Desktop Environment

Ubuntu with Enjade Pure
